::KitKat::

She could smell the scent of a male wolf.  She transformed into bot 
and walked on.  She went along until she could see a bot standing up 
in front of a cave.
She slowly walked forward.  Not wanting to alarm him, she spoke out 
to him,"Hello, My name is KitKat.  My Companion is Terrorsaur. We 
came under orders of Quickstrike to see you. May we approach?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@h...> 
wrote:
> Terrorsaur/Rowdy Wolf:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "From what I was told, bring him back to base." Terrorsaur replied 
to 
> KitKat. "I don't like the idea that he could blow our heads off 
though. But 
> I don't have an argument over a conflict." He laughed breifly.
> 
> He put his scanners on, now passing the last marker. Ahead was a 
formation 
> of a cave. Or what looked like one. This may be the wolf's shelter. 
He 
> transformed to robot mode and withdrew his gun. "Stand-by." he said 
to 
> KitKat through his comm-link. "I think we're here."
> 
> 
> 
> Rowdy Wolf turned his head and sniffed the air. "I smell 
something," he said 
> to Zyber. He lifted his lips from his upper row of teeth. "More 
like 
> someone.
> 
> "Rowdy Wolf, terrorize." he commanded his activation code. It was 
the first 
> time he transformed using the phase. He withdrew his rifle from 
under his 
> heavy furs, and stepped out of his cave.
>
